entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:38 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 7:56 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with blizzard developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
